owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Axe is a kind of weapon favoured by the Dwarves and few Elves.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Axe

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Bow is a long-range weapon usually, but not exclusively, made of wood that shoots arrows.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bow

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Fictional characters, divided into various races, created by J. R.R. Tolkien.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Character

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the races of fictional characters populating Middle Earth.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dwarf

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the races of fictional characters populating Middle Earth.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Elf

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The least common of Hobbits.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fallohide

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The most common type of Hobbit.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Harfoot

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the races of fictional characters populating Middle Earth.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Hobbit

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the races of fictional characters populating Middle Earth.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Human

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Many different languages are spoken by the characters living in Middle-Earth.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Language

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: One of the races of fictional characters populating Middle Earth.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Maiar

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Names, in Tolkien's universe, are very important. As a matter of fact, the writer carefully thought about the meaning and the etimology of the names he created.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Name

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Subclass of Elf. Noldor are High Elves of the Second Clan who migrated to Valinor and lived in Eldamar.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Noldor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: In Tolkien's universe, many places are created and taken into consideration.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Place

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: In Middle-Earth, rings are artefacts which possess magical powers.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ring

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of Hobbit who lived in swampy areas.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Stoor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: In Middle-Earth, swords are forged out different materials and they might have secret hidden powers according to the hand that is using them.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sword

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Sublcass of Elf. Teleri were the third of the Elf clans who came to Aman.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Teleri

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Subclass of Elf. They are the fairest and most noble of the High Elves.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Vanyar

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Characters are provided with a weapon which they use to perform actions.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Weapon

owl:NamedIndividual.means: eating between meals, the end of a bag

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Wizard Staff is the primary tool, power conduit, and sometimes weapon of Wizards, which might have also served as a symbol of their power or rank.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Staff
